Title: Authorizes veterinarians to provide free veterinary care services to individuals in shelters to receive mandatory continuing education credit
Summary: Authorizes veterinarians to provide free veterinary care services to individuals in shelters as self-instructional coursework to receive credit for their continuing education requirement.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to authorizing veterinarians to provide free veterinary care services to individuals in shelters to receive mandatory continuing education credit
